channel.title: Exercises on logicalmethods.ai
channel.description: Recent content in Exercises on logicalmethods.ai

item.title: Logic and AI
item.description:
Definitions
a.) Inference

Give a definition of inference in the logical sense. Include some examples of inferences, as well as non-examples, explaining why the definition applies to the examples.

b.) Validity

Give a definition of deductive and inductive validity. For both, include some examples of valid and invalid inferences, again explaining why the definition applies.
